surveyLab.intro: Core: instrument design, validation, and deployment for governments & nonprofits.

products.title: Ethics Climate Survey
products.what: Measures everyday ethical culture, reporting norms, leadership tone, and compliance capacity.
sampleItems: My supervisor acts in ways consistent with organizational values.
Employees feel safe reporting suspected misconduct without fear of retaliation.

products.title: Ethics Infrastructure Survey
products.what: Assesses policies, training programs, oversight, and accountability systems.
sampleItems: Our organization has clear processes for handling conflicts of interest.
There is regular ethics training that addresses real job duties.

products.title: Custom Modules
products.what: Short modules tailored to mission- or sector-specific concerns (e.g. procurement ethics).

resources.translational: Student + AI summaries, policy briefs, short reads for practitioners.
